input.sentences: being an easter bunny | i have to do my homework .
there is a ton of people on the opposite team .
some people | like this little girl | are not easy to trick .
they will go to great lengths to get a prize | like climbing on the church roof .
so | i try to up my game and get into their faces as much as i can .
output.sentences: I told Lilly after she did her homework, we could go to the church and see the Easter bunny, and so we did.
It was a bit unusual having the Easter egg hunt in the cemetary, behind the old, stone church.
Lilly wore her favorite pink dress and didn't seem to mind about the odd selection of where to look for eggs.
No one, it turned out, gave it much thought.
The Easter bunny was on hand to offer suggestions and give out extra treats and prizes.
